comments.en:
This printer has slots for CompactFlash, SmartMedia, and Sony Memory Stick photo memory cards. so one can print photos without PC. The front panel has a graphical user interface which gives many options for printing from photo cards. There is also a connector for a little color LCD monitor for choosing the photos to print. Photo download works with kernel 2.4.21 or later. The memory card can be simply mounted as a USB-mass-storage device then.

6-color CMYKcm printing.

Roll paper feeder with cutter. Roll paper handling works as with older Epson Stylus Photo models, there are no control options for the cutter in Gimp-Print yet and when one presses the "Roll Feed" button on the front panel to eject the printout, it is cut, but near 2 cm after the image, leaving a white border. So for correctly cut photos you have to copy them onto a memory card and then print via the front panel.

USB only.
